alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 4:27PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pittsburg County through 500 PM CST... At 427 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Scipio to 7 miles south of Kiowa. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Haywood... Blocker... Mcalester Regional Airport... Scipio... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Arpelar... Dow... Bache... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Oklahoma.
